item.title: Manhole is on the driveway of no. 15 Pickford Close, 24th November
item.description:
Every few years we experience recurring issues with the drainage, and in the past the council has attended and resolved the problem. The blockage usually starts near our propertyâ€™s and then leads to the whole street overflowing if not addressed promptly. Could you please arrange for the drainage to be checked and cleared again?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pickford Close, Welling, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road closed but barriers removed now dangerous, 24th November
item.description:
SGN have dug large holes and closed the road on 484 eoute bus now diverted. No workmen on site today or yesterday. Barriers have been removed but motorists to allow them through and is now v dangerous and likely to cause an accident. Barriers need replacing with more permanent / heavy ones asap
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harefield Road, Brockley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
